overview: Nightsuckers - Every Halloween, this insidious vampire terrorizes humanity. General Lang has a plan to end her reign of havoc by sending the two best mercenaries after her. Maybe if they work together as a team, they can defeat her.  Who said you're out of luck on Halloween. - When Regan arrives to the office Halloween party, Mz Berlin suggests they all bob for apples.  The Brides of Frankencock - Rachel Roxxx has just built the monster Frankencock, But he escapes. He walks in on a costume party where Kiara sees his huge attribute and brings him to her room.  Day of the Living MILF - When a medical truck carrying sperm crashes in a cemetery, MILFS come back to life with one purpose; get huge cock.  Anal Sacrifice - Emma Heart is tonight's sacrifice as part of a satanic ritual which occurs once a year on Halloween! The sacrifice is one of the flesh...juicy, bubbly flesh and most importantly...an anal sacrifice!
title: A Big Tit Whorror Flick
